website_summaries.verdict: CNC machine lathing has created a precision thickness on the face that is impossible to achieve on hand-polished drivers.
pros: The head feels light and thin when you swing it, and the face is hot
When it hits the ball it has a solid feel to it and your drives are much straighter than you would imagine
cons: Might lead to errant drives if you don't produce enough clubhead speed

customer_reviews.title: Right club, wrong shaft
customer_reviews.text: Great club. Really solid strikes and the milled face makes it easy to see contact spots when you’re getting acquainted with the club. The only issue wasn’t with the club, it was with the vendor. I ordered a HZRDUS yellow shaft. It says it’s 65g. I got a 75g one. If you’re really particular, you might not be cool with this.
customer_reviews.author: Franco M.

customer_reviews.title: Update after first round
customer_reviews.text: So i played 9 holes with the driver set at 9.5 degrees with mixed results. Not really longer than my old driver. THEn i set it at 10.5 degrees for the back 9 holes which plays longer than the front. WOW what a difference. Killing it straight down the middle and at least 30 yards longer than my old driver. Hit 1 drive 306 and my buddies couldn't believe it. Yep and Im 60years old, but in pretty good shape. FIVE STARS from me on the driver.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite driver.
customer_reviews.text: The face is [or seems] smaller than my Cobra Fly-Z driver. The F8+ "feel" and sound at impact is not very satisfying. I can't hit this as far as my Fly-Z either. It does not seem to be as forgiving. I don't have confidence whatsoever in this driver. I read the great reviews, but I advise proceeding with caution before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: MnBoy

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical, I hadn’t played a cobra club since the mid 90s and I am very impressed I have been playing a Titleist 10.5° 915 ( which I love) and I must say I love the cobra even more
customer_reviews.author: SSHinBLT

customer_reviews.title: Hits very straight.
customer_reviews.text: Very straight. Head a bit light. Had to purchase extra weights to make the head heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice driver great feel. Half the cost of the new stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Great driver would be even better if I knew how to use it properly. Really wanted the F9 but with the price being half of the F9 I can put that toward more time one the course. Got the 3w 2 weeks after this I liked it that much. Only bummer if you get the grey one your high hits will start to chip the paint so just hit it pure every time and you’ll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: littleking

customer_reviews.title: Great feel and forgiveness.
customer_reviews.text: Love this club. Picked the green Aldila shaft and really love the combo. Mishits still go--very forgiving (even in the F8+). And the feel from the face is great. I switched from the Cobra BioCell and prefer this new carbon/metal muted thump to the tinny ping of the past one. Hate buying new tech for top dollar and this is a solid way to get a great club and save $.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping!!
customer_reviews.text: Received my item a lot faster than expected. Just opened the box but everything looks in accordance so far. Cant wait to try it out! Cobra F8+ Update: Great Driver very forgiving. Still launched 240 with hits on heel! Took some getting used to as my prior driver was quite heavy. Overall I see myself using this for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jinxster

customer_reviews.title: Great Club!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to pay for this year's model, so I bought this one and it's just as good as the 2019 model that I swung at the store. Gives me lots of distance and you can use the weight to change how the club hits.
customer_reviews.author: TxGal4Ever

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Driver
customer_reviews.text: Easy 5 star rating when you pay $180 for a brand new high quality driver that looks good, sounds good, and feels good. The Cobra Connect feature is interesting from a data tracking standpoint, but I don't have enough data to determine whether it's bringing any added value.
customer_reviews.author: Jan G.

customer_reviews.title: Good Club
customer_reviews.text: Good looking driver! Its a quiet sounding driver! Center hits you cant even feel them, they fly! I have a Fly Z which is a good driver too, gives a little more feed back!
customer_reviews.author: Richard J.

customer_reviews.title: Forgiving and long
customer_reviews.text: I got the driver and took it to the range. After a few swing I really saw the game improvement this club will give me. I played a downhill short par 4 of 300 yards and put the ball on the green. Got a 3 inch tap in birdie. Good club. I like the ability to adjust the loft and lie.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good club
customer_reviews.text: Great club, snapped the shaft after about 200 swings. My swing speed is high, around 120+, but didn't expect the project x x-stiff to snap that early.
customer_reviews.author: kyle manning

customer_reviews.title: Product description/shaft choice is wrong
customer_reviews.text: Hzrdus yellow 65 shaft is in drop down box, but I have returned 1 and received 2 clubs now with the 76 gram shaft instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ben S

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Took it from box to course and didn't dissapoint. My first 9 holes, 7 of 7 fairways and long. Reached a par 5 in 2, into a 20+ wind from back tees.
customer_reviews.author: Saverio DiGioia

customer_reviews.title: Shaft broke in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: Not even a month with the club and the shaft broke in half. I didn’t have a miss swing. I didn’t hit the ground. The shaft just broke. I’m 150 pounds soaking wet with a 90 mph club head speed. HOWEVER golf discount and cobra golf customer service were very helpful in getting a new shaft sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Gorze

customer_reviews.title: Improved My Game
customer_reviews.text: Love this Rickie Fowler driver. Has made my game so much more consistent. My mis hits are corrected! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase......extended length off the tee with much better precision.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wessendorf

customer_reviews.title: Great price and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great club fast shipping can’t wait to go use this club Carl’s golf land is the spot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing driver! Very well made and I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Added 5 to 10 yards from my previous driver
customer_reviews.text: A very good club. Just make sure the shaft you choose is the correct shaft for your swing speed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jasper R. Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Amazon’s mistake worked out lol
customer_reviews.text: You sent me the wrong one!!!!!!!! But I like it anyway, prob the better choice for me anyhow.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome driver
customer_reviews.text: Awesome club straight and long came with head cover an wrench
customer_reviews.author: Greg avrett

customer_reviews.title: Get Broad forgiveness!
customer_reviews.text: Great exceptional, high-tech driver ever. Broad & generous forgiveness ever. 100+30% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: jason Lee

customer_reviews.title: Cobra F8 drivet
customer_reviews.text: I can’t hit the ball any better than I fix with my kid driver. No if is not me but the club
customer_reviews.author: Quince Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good driver for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: The loft adjustability on this club is a huge plus. I tried it at a 9.5 but was not getting the results I wanted. Once I switched it to a 10.5 I found the club to be more effective than my old driver. The ball was traveling consistently further in the air by about 25 yards. This driver is also very forgiving on hits not on the center of the clubface. I am very pleased with this purchase and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K

customer_reviews.title: Buy now!
customer_reviews.text: Very forgiving driver with good distance. Makes a different sound than typical drivers, sounds like a baseball bat. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Shaft broke after a month
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the driver with the Aldila NV 2KXV Blue 60 shaft. As a frequent and long time golfer this driver felt great at first, it performed well on the range and the course, but the shaft snapped after a month. If you are looking for a reliable club I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like to buy a lot of golf balls?
customer_reviews.text: Just flat out horrible. I’ve never seen a club cut so many balls.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

product_meta.title: 2018 Cobra King F8+ Driver Nardo (Men's, Right Hand, Aldila NV 2KXV Green 65, Stiff Flex)
product_meta.description: Our first CNC milled driver face paired with 360 Aero technology design brings you COBRA's smartest, fastest, most precise driver ever. Tour preferred shape for maximum workability.
feature_bullets: Precision milled face-our first fully Machined driver face is CNC milled to create our thinnest, hottest, and most precise face EVER
360 Aero-Innovative Polymer Aero trips positionedaround the perimeter of the clubhead improve drag reduction face-on throughthe downswing to generate maximumclubhead speed.
Ultralight Carbon Fiber Crown-A lighter 5-ply carbon fiber crown saves discretionaryweight to move the CG lower and deeper, producinghigher trajectories and increased forgiveness.
F8+ adjustable cg-2 CG positions in the front and back result in two very different ball flights to help you tune your distance and trajectory under variable conditions
My Fly 8 with SmartPad-8 easily adjustable loft settings help you managetrajectory and fine tune launch conditions to maximizedistance while SmartPad keeps the face square.

specifications.Item model number: DR KGF8+ GY BK GPH STF ALDG 1 RH
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
